page.title: 01General Introduction
page.content: We live in a Border country of { {outstanding natural beauty, unspoilt and much loved. Todleth,Llanfawr, steep and rugged Roundton,{Corndon rising to 513m}with secluded Hyssington nestling below give rise to spectacular views over the heart of Montgomery and the Shropshire Plain. Rich in wildlife, rare bats, wild flowers, birdlife, the area also has {archeological & geological interests}. Isolated & scattered half timbered & local stone farmsteads & cottages, sheepscape, dingles, marshes, lanes, bridleways, footpaths & the Churches make up a priceless heritage. Maintenance of Community Life and a high evaluation of the family, good hospitality and neighbourliness create our caring Community.
